post_title: LF Heritage Lot Buyer: 3 T206 Polar Bear Misprint Backs
post_content:
Looking for the buyer of this lot from the May 2022 Heritage Auction:

1909-11 T206 Polar Bear SGC Authentic Trio (3) - All With Misprint Backs

I want to buy one of the three cards in the lot and I’ll pay close to what you paid for the whole lot for the one card.

If you bought it or know who did can you msg me please?
I was the buyer. PM me. Thank you.
